name: Gear Kitty
description:
Notes: A later gear/platform is finicky, but still very possible to pass. Also, you'll lose power-ups if you don't save them before death(gates will stay open regardless).

Gear kitty(Original Ver.) made for LD36.

Made with:
Engine: Stencyl
Sound: Sfxr/Audacity
Music: Made with BeepBox
Graphics: GraphicsGale

Visit our website!

Follow me on Twitter! <3

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=p...

Updates:

-Fixed 2nd power-up trapping player in.

-Added "Thank you for playing" text for ending.
